comment.author: 52166776@N05
comment._content: these are almost certainly relatives, if not the parents of Lord Maginnis former MP

comment.author: 61238957@N06
comment._content:
The photograph above is my parents on their wedding day 9th. August 1934.  My father is GILBERT ORR MAGINNIS who was born 24th. February 1909 - died 8th. November 1974.

My mother is MARGARET ELIZABETH WIGGINS who was born 14th. September 1913 - died 1st. January 1984.

(They had three sons:  KENNETH WIGGINS (Lord Maginnis) born 21st. January 1938 - DONALD EDWARD born 19th. April 1941 - JAMES ERIC born 15th. September 1942).

The bestman is GEORGE ALEXANDER MAGINNIS (brother of Gilbert) who was born 1911(?) -  killed in France 18th. July 1944.

The bridesmaid is VERA WHITCROFT - best friend of my mother from their days as pupils at the High School for Girls, Dungannon.  I have no further information about her.

(This information has been provided by ERIC MAGINNIS , Guelph, Ontario, Canada)

comment.author: 61238957@N06
comment._content:
(Here is further information on VERA WHITCROFT which I received from my brother Ken)

The WHITCROFT family came from the Omagh-Sion Mills-Sixmilecross area of Tyrone (not sure of exact location)!  

VERA WHITCROFT (deceased) was married to  BERT ROBERTS who was a Professor at either Manchester or Birmingham University.  They had no family.

Vera had a brother (name unknown) who was a Church of Ireland clergyman.

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thank you Eric for adding so much detail and for confirming ecthelion2's positive identification of your father and mother.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
